_description_zh: EUR/USD - 低成本零售經紀商情境

notes: 成本密度 1.15 pips = 佣金等效 0.35 + 點差 0.80

_analysis.interpretation: Low-cost EUR/USD trading shows only ~11% efficiency loss at P=15 pips. The lower RR_g (2.0) means higher baseline win rate requirement (33% vs 25%).
_analysis.interpretation_zh: 低成本 EUR/USD 交易在 P=15 pips 時僅損失約 11% 效率。較低的 RR_g (2.0) 意味著基準勝率需求較高（33% vs 25%）。
_analysis.key_insight: Even with low costs, shrinking P to 5 pips would increase Loss_RR to ~35%
_analysis.key_insight_zh: 即使成本低，將 P 縮小到 5 pips 也會使 Loss_RR 增加到約 35%
